title: PBE
body: I want to ask you guys how much time is needed to recieve an answer from riot for the pbe account . Thanks. Bonus question:what victorious skin u think will appear ? <3

replies.body:
There's no projected turnaround on when you'll hear back about PBE access. We send out invites in waves and choose players based on criteria that changes all the time. Generally, we look for players who are positive influences in the community and will give some great feedback!

You can find our full FAQ on PBE [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) Let me know if you have any questions.

Bonus Answer: I don't know, but I think Victorious Teemo would be cool as hell! :)

http://whofedthischamp.com/images/uploads/247/Victorious-Teemo-Skin-thumb-big.jpg
You made my day with this photo :))) love u dude
